name: Twitter v2: Lookup user data
description:
Add a Twitter handle (=username) as seed node, e.g. "uni_greifswald".

In order to use this preset you need to register an app at Twitter and transfer the API key (-> Client ID) and API secret key (-> Client Secret) into the Facepager settings, next to the login button. Afterwards, click login to get an access token. See https://developer.twitter.com/en/apply-for-access

You can get more data about a user by adding fields, see the reference.

Reference: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/users/lookup/api-reference/get-users-by-username-username
